about.name: Omkar Dongre
about.title: Fullstack Developer | Software Engineer
about.bio: Ex-Sandvine engineer with 2+ years of experience designing network security systems, threat detection engines, and scalable microservices. Strong foundation in Go, C++, and system-level programming. Currently building fullstack applications with modern web technologies.

experience.description: Designed and implemented network security and threat detection systems. Developed Go microservices for real-time threat detection across distributed network devices. Optimized network protocols and implemented system diagnostics monitoring with Python APIs.

Led Oracle to MSSQL database migration project reducing operational costs. Developed comprehensive Selenium-based test automation frameworks for ALIM platform. Implemented automated reporting systems and optimized JMeter performance testing scripts.

projects.name: SocialHub
projects.description: Microservices-based social media platform with real-time chat, notifications, media uploads, and activity feeds. Features scalable, event-driven architecture, automated cloud deployment, and robust CI/CD for high reliability and easy extensibility.
highlights: Automated cloud deployment on AWS ECS

projects.name: Video Sharing Platform
projects.description: Cross-platform video sharing platform with real-time recording, uploads, AI transcription and summaries, dynamic CMS management, secure cloud storage, team collaboration, notifications, and an integrated AI chatbot.
highlights: Integrated AI chatbot for user assistance

projects.name: Food Ordering App
projects.description: A Food ordering platform where users can browse restaurants, add menu items to cart, place orders, and pay online. Restaurant owners can manage their restaurant profile, menus, and track incoming orders in real time.
highlights: Full e-commerce functionality with Stripe payments

personality.communication_style: Clear, concise, and technical when needed
strengths: Bridging low-level system knowledge with high-level application development
